tcruds.title: Student Detail
tcruds.date: These section contains the full, comprehensive collection of student detaile, personal information, academic documentation, and any other relevant files and records maintained for individual student.

tcruds.title: Student Subjects
tcruds.date: The academic courses or subjects that the student is enrolled in and studying at the present time.

tcruds.title: Student Attendance
tcruds.date: The student attendance report, which records and monitors the daily presence, tardiness, and absences of a student

tcruds.title: Student Parent
tcruds.date: These individuals are the parents, guardians, or other adult caregivers who are legally responsible for the students and their wellbeing.

tcruds.title: Student Timetable
tcruds.date: These are the detailed timetables and class schedules that specify the daily and weekly educational activities and requirements for each individual student

tcruds.title: Student Exams
tcruds.date: This section contains the exams, tests, and other assessment materials that evaluate the academic performance and progress of individual students.

tcruds.title: Student Homeworks
tcruds.date: This section includes the exams or assessment materials for a student.

tcruds.title: Student Payments
tcruds.date: This section presents the payment reports or financial documentation detailing the payments made by the student
